title: Steve Jobs
description: Steve Jobs is widely considered one of, if not the most impactful, leaders of product creation. His drive to deliver quality products focused on user experience made Apple the giant of the age of individualism as we have come to know it.
author: Matthew Bernhardt

title: Nelson Mandela
description: Through deep and intense self-reflection, Nelson Mandela was able to develop the vision necessary to overcome in the fight against apartheid in South Africa by advocating for reconciliation and forgiveness rather than revenge.
author: Matthew Bernhardt
